amendment.description: Amendment allows foreign banks in the U.S. to expand their operations by allowing bank agencies to upgrade to branches with the approval of the appropriate chartering agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 5 printed in H. Rept. 106-214 to allow foreign banks to upgrade bank agencies and branches with the approval of the appropriate chartering agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foley amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
